NAME: Rajarshi Datta
ABOUT:
If you are an entrepreneur, CEO or Managing Director running an ambitious company with fast growth potential and looking to build your company to ensure you get the very highest price for it when/if you decide to sell, our ‘part-time Finance Director’ model may well be of interest to you…

Ambitious companies looking to grow quickly need to build a quality finance function led by a senior Finance Director with ‘big business’ experience, but that person does not necessarily need to be full-time. 

I’m a part-time CFO for the CFO Centre part of the FD Centre (UK), the world’s number 1 provider of senior, high calibre part-time CFOs.

Our business model means that growing businesses can take on a top quality finance director for a fraction of what it would cost to appoint one on a full-time basis.

Our goal is to help busy CEOs and MDs free up time to grow their businesses while we take on the management of the finance function.

We introduced this model to the UK back in 2001 and each year more and more businesses all across the globe are choosing this option in comparison to the full time alternative.

When we engage with our clients we perform a detailed review using our unique 12 Box Architecture which helps us to understand the areas of vulnerability (as well as the areas of strength) in your business before designing a comprehensive implementation plan.
	By way of an overview, we can help businesses:
1.	Manage cash flow
2.	Improve profit
3.	Tighten up internal controls
4.	Create reporting infrastructure to improve visibility
5.	Plan for an exit
6.	Manage risk
7.	(Re)design the business plan and create an implementation timetable 
8.	Find investment/funding
9.	Become compliant
10.	Maximise tax efficiency
11.	Advise on outsourcing
12.	Manage the relationship with the bank
